text: The 2020–21 season is Fortitudo Bologna's 89th in existence and the club's 2nd consecutive season in the top tier Italian basketball. == Overview == After a successful, although incomplete, 2019-20 season as a newly promoted team, Bologna was able to raise the bar of the ambition and compete in the Basketball Champions League for the 2020-21 season. == Kit == == Players == ===Current roster=== ===Depth chart=== ===Squad changes === ====In==== |} ====Out==== |} ==== Confirmed ==== |} ==== Coach ==== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! style="" | Nat. ! style="" | Name ! style="" | Age. ! colspan=2 style="" | Last team ! style="" | Type ! style="" | Ends ! style="" | Date ! colspan=2 style="" | Replaces ! style="" | Date ! style="" | Type |- | | Romeo Sacchetti | | Vanoli Cremona | | 2 | 2022 | 27 May 2020 | | Antimo Martino | 27 May 2020 | mutual consent |} == Competitions == === Supercup === === Champions League === === Regular season === == References == Category:2020–21 Basketball Champions League Category:2020–21 in Italian basketball by club
title: 2020–21 Fortitudo Bologna season
